title: Is Philly....Special?
description:
Mina and Aaron Schatz of Football Outsiders discuss 10 intriguing takeaways from Aaron's 2022 NFL Preview including- the scheme overhaul in Miami, good news and bad news for Denver, the Eagles' chances at the #1 seed in the NFC, and why the Giants are the front runners for the 1st overall pick in 2023.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
